1.name: Ratio: Protect. well & spring / well & spring

rule.name: Ratio: Protect. well & spring / well & spring
rule.formula: =IF(ISERR((IF(ISNUMBER({F#12,Q#current,P#current}), {F#12,Q#current,P#current}, SUM({F#24,Q#current,P#current}, {F#32,Q#current,P#current}, {F#44,Q#current,P#current})))/((IF(ISNUMBER({F#12,Q#current,P#current}), {F#12,Q#current,P#current}, SUM({F#24,Q#current,P#current}, {F#32,Q#current,P#current}, {F#44,Q#current,P#current})))+(IF(ISNUMBER({F#16,Q#current,P#current}), {F#16,Q#current,P#current}, SUM({F#36,Q#current,P#current}, {F#48,Q#current,P#current}))))),"",(IF(ISNUMBER({F#12,Q#current,P#current}), {F#12,Q#current,P#current}, SUM({F#24,Q#current,P#current}, {F#32,Q#current,P#current}, {F#44,Q#current,P#current})))/((IF(ISNUMBER({F#12,Q#current,P#current}), {F#12,Q#current,P#current}, SUM({F#24,Q#current,P#current}, {F#32,Q#current,P#current}, {F#44,Q#current,P#current})))+(IF(ISNUMBER({F#16,Q#current,P#current}), {F#16,Q#current,P#current}, SUM({F#36,Q#current,P#current}, {F#48,Q#current,P#current})))))
